author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36175 by changing the names output sqlite and xml (`FrameworkJobReport`) files, as those could be used by other cmssw unit tests, as scram starts all the tests from the top level cmssw dev directory. Some tests create sub-directories but most unit tests just create file in cmssw top level dir.
See https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36175#issuecomment-975710398 and https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/36175#issuecomment-975772532

#### PR validation:

Unit tests run successfully

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A
title: update naming of output file of `testAlCaHarvesting` to avoid concurrency issues
